basic.description: This course is an introduction to electromagnetism, light, and modern physics for non-physical science majors. Two lectures, one recitation, and one laboratory each week. Students who have previously received credit for PHY 2049C may not register for PHY 2054C.
basic.subject: PHY
basic.title: College Physics B

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: PHY 2053C or PHY 2048C. Corequsiite: PHY 2054L.
